SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.ISAUTH, A.FID, A.FNAME, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.NLDNO, A.MOBILE, A.PHONE1, A.IMAGEHOST, A.FILENAME, A.CATEGORY, A.SERVICETYPE, A.REMARK, A.EMAIL, A.CLOSEDDAY, A.OPENDAY, A.WEBSITE, A.INFO, A.QRCODE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, S.BASNAME AS SERVICETYPE, P.BASNAME AS PLACETYPE, A.FULLADDRESS, A.SIDO, A.GUGUN, A.DONG, A.NEWADDRESS FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD S ON A.SERVICETYPE = S.BASECD AND S.GRPCD = 'SERVICETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD P ON A.PLACETYPE = P.BASECD AND P.GRPCD = 'PLACETYPE' WHERE A.ISAUTH = 'Y'
AND A.FNAME like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR A.FULLADDRESS like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%') OR MOBILE like CONCAT('%',#search#,'%')
LIMIT #startRow# , #endRow#

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.ISAUTH, A.FID, A.FNAME, A.LATITUDE, A.LONGITUDE, A.NLDNO, A.MOBILE, A.PHONE1, A.IMAGEHOST, A.FILENAME, A.CATEGORY, A.SERVICETYPE, A.REMARK, A.EMAIL, A.CLOSEDDAY, A.OPENDAY, A.WEBSITE, A.INFO, A.QRCODE, A.SAVEDATE, A.EDITDATE, S.BASNAME AS SERVICETYPE, P.BASNAME AS PLACETYPE, A.FULLADDRESS, A.SIDO, A.GUGUN, A.DONG, A.NEWADDRESS FROM PLACE A LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD S ON A.SERVICETYPE = S.BASECD AND S.GRPCD = 'SERVICETYPE' LEFT OUTER JOIN PBASCD P ON A.PLACETYPE = P.BASECD AND P.GRPCD = 'PLACETYPE' WHERE A.ISAUTH = 'Y'
AND A.FNAME like CONCAT('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR A.FULLADDRESS like CONCAT('%',#searchWord#,'%') OR MOBILE like CONCAT('%',#searchWord#,'%')
Order By A.Fid Desc

SELECT sql_calc_found_rows A.EID, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.ISAUTH, A.STARTDATE, A.ENDDATE, A.EDITDATE, B.FNAME, B.FULLADDRESS FROM PLACEEVENT A INNER JOIN PLACE B ON A.FID = B.FID WHERE A.ISDELETE = 'N' AND A.ISAUTH = 'Y'
AND TITLE like CONCAT('%',#title#,'%') OR CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#content#,'%')
ORDER BY A.EID DESC LIMIT #startRow#,#endRow#
